current.fact: Mind-blowing fact: The value of Pi will be officially "rounded down" to 3.14 from 3.14159265359 on December 31, 1999.
current.raw_fact: The value of Pi will be officially "rounded down" to 3.14 from 3.14159265359 on December 31, 1999.

history.fact: Fascinating tidbit: Leonardo Da Vinci invented the scissors.

history.fact: Today's discovery: Giraffes have no vocal cords.
Amazing discovery: The very first song played on MTV was `Video Killed The Radio Star` by the Buggles.
